Changes
=======

0.1.3(2014-09-26)
-----------------

- DotIt support nest dict.

0.1.2(2014-09-26)
-----------------

- add dotit: include DotIt, DotDict, DotOrderedDict

0.1.1(2014-09-19)
-----------------

- add logginghandlers:
  - SocketHandler
  - DatagramHandler
  - RedisListHandler
  - RedisPublishHandler

0.1.0(2014-09-18)
-----------------

- callit
- loadit
- yamlfile
